title: Indian Army Project — Human-Following Bot — Software Side
subtitle: Indian Army - Ladakh Scouts

points.p: Utilized GANs for data augmentation to create a diverse dataset for training the YOLO v7 model, enhancing its accuracy and robustness
Trained the IIIT dataset containing photos with a Synthetic Rain Algorithm called SYRA GAN
Achieved a Frechet Inception Distance (FID) score of 31.4, indicating a high quality of generated images relative to the original photos
